ksdk:manifest.name: SDK version 2.3.1 package for MK22DX128xxx5 device
ksdk:manifest.brief: This is SDK version 2.3.1 manifest file. It describes the content of the SDK version 2.3.1 package for MK22DX128xxx5 device and additional settings for tools that support SDK version 2.3.1

board.name: TWR-K21D50M
board.description: TWR-K21D50M: Kinetis K21 50 MHz MCU Tower System Module

specific.content:
The TWR-K21D50M module is a development board for the Kinetis® K11, K12, K21 and K22 MCUs, which are ideal for optimized, cost-sensitive security applications.
This Tower® module is designed to enable rapid prototyping and development for applications requiring medium embedded memory densities, security through tamper detect and crypto unit and communication through USB.
The TWR-K21D50M module operates as a standalone debug tool and can also be combined and used as part of the modular Tower System development platform.

device.name: MK21DA5
device.description: K21_50: Kinetis® K21-50 MHz, Full-Speed USB, Anti-Tamper Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-M4 Core

specific.content: K21_50: Kinetis® K21-50 MHz, Full-Speed USB, Anti-Tamper Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-M4 Core <ul> <li>Features hardware encryption and tamper detection;/li> <li>Includes a rich suite of analog, communication, timing and control peripherals to accommodate a wide range of requirements;/li> <li>Maximizes board space and enhances performance with minimum-length interconnections;/li> <li>Provides performance efficiency with industry-leading low power;/li> <li>Delivers significant BOM savings through smart on-chip integration;/li> <li>Shares the comprehensive enablement and scalability of the Kinetis® portfolio;/li> <ul>

device.name: MK22D5
device.description: K22_50: Kinetis® K22-50 MHz, Cost Effective, Full-Speed USB Microcontrollers (MCUs) based on ARM® Cortex®-M4 Core

specific.content:
The Kinetis® K22 50 MHz MCU family targets cost-sensitive applications requiring low-power, processing efficiency and mid-range memory density.
  • Includes a rich suite of analog, communication, timing and control peripherals to accommodate a wide range of requirements
  • Provides performance efficiency with industry-leading low power
  • Delivers significant BOM savings through smart on-chip integration
  • Shares the comprehensive enablement and scalability of the Kinetis portfolio
